channel.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
> **[color=grey]Shadow (Neutral Killer)[/color]** > > Passive: Shadowy Shield: Any attempts to kill you will be redirected at your target. You are immune to occupation. > > Passive: (name needed): If you are bleeding or poisoned, you will give that affliction to your target, and cure it for yourself. The amount of time they have is equal to the amount of time you would have had. > > Night Ability: Dark Grasp: You will kill anyone your target visits. You will appear to investigators as your target appears. You will kill your target if they visit no one you can kill.
Change log: 1:Prevented from killing self. 2: Tweaked Dark Grasp.

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
What if it just kills their target if they kill no one else with them? It would also prevent kills from stopping if they targeted Psychic or Prince.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
There is one problem with this class. It cannot close out games. If there is 3 people left that cannot visit like noble, hunter, psychic or so… they have no way to effectively kill, especially if you think about them possibly targeting you if they could visit. It could use a secondary method of attack.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
That rarely happens enough to be an issue imo

Read full topic

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
If a butler Occupys an assassin 3 times and then the assassin attacks you then what?

Also an Enforcer frenzy could bypass it but that isn’t a problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
Ah.
I thought there was one target that you would “stalk” the entire game

Read full topic

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
@Okx There is no occ immune Killer. Since Possessor and Sorcerer cant be in same game. If Hunter attacks, then they trust transfer the bleeding.

@3DT_CheesyKnives What do you mean if target is lynched? They’re only your target for that night.

Read full topic

wo. this is pretty great.

only the hunter or barriered killer could?

item.description:
So if an occ immune person attacks the Shadow, the Shadow will die?

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
So is your target randomly assigned?
And if your target is lynched?
Seems original tho

Read full topic

item.title: Shadow (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Shadow (Neutral Killer)

Passive: Shadowy Shield: Any attempts to kill you will be redirected at your target. You are immune to occupation.

Passive: (name needed): If you are bleeding or poisoned, you will give that affliction to your target, and cure it for yourself. The amount of time they have is equal to the amount of time you would have had.

Night Ability: Dark Grasp: You will kill anyone your target visits. You will appear to investigators as your target appears. You will kill your target if they visit no one you can kill.

Change log:
1:Prevented from killing self.
2: Tweaked Dark Grasp.

Read full topic
